title.rendered: “IDF Targets Hezbollah Terrorist Strongholds in Southern Lebanon: In-Depth Coverage and Analysis”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

IDF forces are attacking terror targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in southern Lebanon

A short while ago, combat aircraft attacked a terrorist infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the area of Kfar Shouba, alongside a terrorist infrastructure and a military building of the organization in the area of ​​Merkaba in southern Lebanon.

During the night, two rocket launches were identified from Lebanon towards the Mount Dov area, IDF forces attacked the sources of fire with artillery and tanks, in addition, the forces identified and attacked a launcher in the Shebaa area using tank fire.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3UztV4M
